data.title: Dayton Avenue Baptist Church
data.text:
John

John and his family have been members at DABC since 2010. He and his wife Sari are both MK’s from the Philippines and graduated from Cedarville University in 2010. John began his career in Sports Medicine at Central State University. He transitioned into full-time ministry in 2015, serving with the Dayton Gospel Mission’s Camp Jabez before joining the staff at DABC as the Middle School Pastor in 2019. John and Sari have 4 Daughters: Lillyan, Kloe, Magnolia, and Oakly. His hobbies include cooking, sports of all kinds, playing with his daughters, and powerlifting
